nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Substracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add
ERC20Basic

nodes.documentation:
@title Basic token
@dev Basic version of StandardToken, with no allowances.
nodes.name: BasicToken

nodes.documentation: @dev total number of tokens in existence
nodes.name: totalSupply
transfer
balanceOf

nodes.documentation:
@title ERC20 interface
@dev see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
nodes.name: ERC20
StandardToken
transferFrom
approve
allowance
increaseApproval
decreaseApproval
Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership
HasNoEther
HasNoEther

nodes.documentation: @dev Disallows direct send by settings a default function without the `payable` flag.
@dev Transfer all Ether held by the contract to the owner.
nodes.name: reclaimEther

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier throws if called by any account other than the pendingOwner.
nodes.name: onlyPendingOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.
nodes.name: claimOwnership
